entry.title: Dog Towel, Pet Water Absorption Towel, Quickly & Comfortably Dries Your Dog
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ushoperra
Type:
Price: 35.99

When your dog gets wet, the inevitable always happens...wet dog smell. Whether they are freshly bathed, coming out of the pool, or caught in the rain, the scent tends to linger. Plus, a wet dog makes messes in your home and vehicle.

So, we've created the Pet Water Absorption Towel to help you out!

✓ Our towel is made from special material that can quickly and easily dry your dog (or cat) in record time. No more smelly odors or messes!

✓ Highly Absorbent — Our tightly woven chenille microfiber fabric is soft, cozy, and soaks up 10x more water than other towels

✓ Easy To Use — The dual hand design allows you to have a better grip when drying your dog. The ribbing on the towel gentle massages your pup and wicks away water from their body

✓ Super Drying — Our towel dries your dog 8x faster than a standard towel! It even beats out a blow dryer!

✓ Durable Material — Our towel can withstand a lot of wear & tear. it's safe for the washer and dryer, too!

✓ Perfect Size — Small, medium, and large dogs can all use this towel and so can cats

Specifications:

✓ Material: Polyester + Cotton

✓ Color: Lake Blue, Gray, Pink, Purple

✓ Size: S, M, L

✓ Weight: 250g-450g

Package Included:

1 X Pet Water Absorption Towel

entry.title: Geometric Pet Dog Ball
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ushoperra
Type:
Price: 39.98

Boosts Your Dogs' Iq As They Work To Remove Treats Of Different Shapes And Sizes

Keep your dog engaged, entertained and mentally stimulated with the intelligent design of this geometric ball.

Made of durable yet lightweight rubber, this ball is stretchy, bouncy and hard to break – making it the ideal toy for catching, chasing, tugging and more.

The rubber material is natural and non-toxic so it’s safe for both you and your furry friend to play with.

The open design of this rubber ball means you can use it on its own, or stuffed with your dog’s favorite treats and toys for an extra challenge at playtime.

Help boost your pet’s IQ, develop problem-solving skills, and curb negative bored behaviour by letting them work to retrieve their reward from within the ball.

The hollow shape also means your pet can easily breathe while carrying this toy, and the seamless design helps keep it durable.

Develop Your Dog's Problem Solving Skills And Increase Mental Ability

Designed To Mentally Stimulate: If you have a dog that gets bored easily, needs to be mentally stimulated, should work on his confidence and IQ, or enjoys problem solving, this ball is a great tool. Its stuffable design means it can be used with treats and other toys of any size to upgrade playtime with a fun challenge.

Lightweight, Hollow Design: The open design of the toy means your dog can breathe easily while carrying it. It’s flexible, which makes it perfect for bouncing, throwing, tugging and more.

Natural And Non-Toxic: This dog toy is made of natural rubber that is non-toxic so it’s safe for both you and your pet to play with. The rubber is durable while remaining lightweight and stretchy, making for a fun and effortless playtime.

Benefits Of Play: Playing with your pet dog on a regular basis not only helps build his confidence and physical skills, but builds the relationship between dog and human. Whether this ball becomes a training tool, a toy to use together, or a toy to keep him busy on his own, it will be the perfect addition to a fun and positive day.

✓ Stuffable with treats and toys of any size
✓ Hollow design allows dog to breathe while holding
✓ Lightweight and stretchy construction
✓ Natural, non-toxic rubber material
✓ Seamless for durability
✓ Great for any type of play

Specifications:
✓ Material: Rubber
✓ Size: 14 cm Diameter

Included:
— 1 X Geometric Pet Dog Ball

entry.title: Pet Carrier Backpack For Cats And Dogs - Front & Back Mesh Carrier Bag
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ushoperra
Type:
Price: 35.98 - 39.98 (2 variants)

Take Your Furry Friend With You Everywhere You Go!

This Pet Carrier Backpack For Cats And Dogs makes it easy to carry your best friend around everywhere!

It gives you the flexibility to take your best friend with you on bike rides, hikes, long walks, and even a quick stop at the market!

There are adjustable padded straps that help distribute weight, preventing back and shoulder strain. An extra waist strap with buckle keeps the backpack stable.

An interior rope with a clip can be used to connect your pet's collar/harness preventing it from jumping out or hurt itself.

The front opening is adjustable with a drawstring to fit your pet perfectly.

A three-dimensional ventilation back pad keeps owners’ backs from sweating.

Front pockets to store leash, whistle, water, snacks, treats, and other necessities.

Keep Your Dog Or Cat Safe And Comfortable On Every Adventure

Safe & Comfortable For Your Pet: A zippered pet pocket lets you reach into the bag and directly calm your dog or cat without opening the bag. Plus, our bag features an innovative design that gives pets ample room!

Durable: Our pet carrier travel backpack is made with heavy-duty materials. A strong EVA base gives pets stable support, and zippers keep pets from escaping. Ideal for work, traveling, and camping!

Comfortable For Owners: A three-dimensional ventilation back pad keeps owners’ backs from sweating. Ergonomic chest and waist straps help distribute weight, preventing back and shoulder strain!

Spacious & Convenient: This travel bag fits cats and small dog breeds. Built with straps and pockets for storing pet supplies, treats, leashes, toys, as well as your water bottle, wallet, and phone!

✓ Portable and great for travel
